hero.title: Compassionate Mental Health Care
hero.description: Evidence-based treatment for depression, anxiety, ADHD, bipolar disorder, and PTSD. Your journey to wellness starts here.

education.title: Mental Health Education
education.description: Learn about conditions, treatments, and evidence-based resources

mindfulness.title: Mindfulness Practices
mindfulness.description: Guided meditations, journaling, and breathing exercises

privacy.title: Your Privacy Matters
privacy.description: All screening tools are processed entirely in your browser. We do not collect, store, or transmit your responses. Your mental health journey is private and secure.
